Package core

Class HlaPacer

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.HlaPacer
  • public abstract class HlaPacer
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to support pacing to wall clock time, or any other time source.

    This class is ThreadSafe as defined by Java Concurrency in Practice, see jcip.net.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static interface  HlaPacer.Source
      Interface for a custom time source.

    • Field Summary

      static HlaPacer.Source SYSTEM_MILLIS_TIME_SOURCE

      static HlaPacer.Source SYSTEM_NANO_TIME_SOURCE
      Time source using System.nanoTime().

      • initialize

        public abstract boolean initialize​(long initialFrame)
        Initialize or restart the pacer.
        Parameters:
        initialFrame - the initial frame
        Returns:
        true if the pacer was initialized, false otherwise

      • pace

        public abstract boolean pace()
        Pace the pacer to the next frame.
        Returns:
        false on frame overrun, true otherwise.
